value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21610v1", "title": "Hard probes and nuclear PDFs", "summary": "A mini-review on the status of global analyses of nuclear parton distribution\nfunctions is given, focusing on the most relevant constraints for the\nhard-probes phenomenology in ultra-relativistic heavy-ion collisions.", "main_category": "hep-ph", "categories": "hep-ph", "published": "2025-04-30T13:09:09Z"}
